name: Community Alliance for Special Education
description: CASE is a nonprofit agency providing special education representation, educational consultation and training regarding children with disabilities. CASE is for parents or community professionals wondering about the educational rights of their child or the child they serve. They provide free individual technical assistance, consultations, representation, and training through their network of educational and legal specialists. CASE helps you make practical sense out of special education laws and is
